## Type of Change

- [ ] New skill
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Enhancement to existing skill
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] CI/CD improvement

## Checklist

### For New Skills

- [ ] SKILL.md has required frontmatter (`name`, `description`)
- [ ] Skill name uses kebab-case
- [ ] Python scripts use PEP 723 inline dependencies
- [ ] Works with standard Obsidian vaults
- [ ] Includes configuration documentation
- [ ] Tested locally with a vault

### For All Changes

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] Self-reviewed my changes
- [ ] Added/updated documentation as needed
- [ ] Tests pass locally
